live_updates: Technicians are on site working to restore service as quickly as possible. No ETA at this time but we will continue to monitor the situation and provide updates when available. Thank you for your patience!
Technicians continue to work to restore service as quickly possible. However, due to the nature of the repairs involved, we expect that this will take a few hours.
Technicians continue to wait for the local power company to complete their repairs. Once power is back online our technicians will resume restoring services.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
41783.summary: Some customers in the Pemberton Heights area of North Vancouver are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
41783.title: Sept 13 - North Vancouver (Pemberton Heights) | Service Interruption (Fix in Progress)

live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
